ygData.subject: Re: Help on Races
ygData.msgSnippet: My character is an Erudite. I picked this race because they have the best stats and being an enchanter, I dont mind that much not having infravision or
ygData.messageBody:
My character is an Erudite. I picked this race because they have the best
stats and being an enchanter, I dont mind that much not having infravision
or ultravision. What was important in my choice also is that Erudin is about
the only place in Norrath that I've never been to ( I had several other
characters before ). About pros and cons, being an enchanter has some pros
and cons, but being an Erudite has mostly pros, with one big con: the
starting area really sucks and you have to take a boat everytime you need to
go back home.
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Greg Short [mailto:eq@...]
Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 3:28 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Help on Races


I am starting Everquest this week! Just waiting for it to arrrive.∩┐╜ I
already want to be an enchanter just wondering what everyone thinks re:pros
and cons of their chosen race.

Baelish
